thread.title: Granit Xhaka hits back at Arsene Wenger critics and brands Arsenal manager "an outstanding coach"
thread.title_full: Granit Xhaka hits back at Arsene Wenger critics and brands Arsenal manager "an outstanding coach"

author: Adrian Kajumba
title: Granit Xhaka hits back at Arsene Wenger critics and brands Arsenal manager "an outstanding coach"
text:
Sport Granit Xhaka hits back at Arsene Wenger critics and brands Arsenal manager "an outstanding coach" Xhaka is the latest star to defend the under-pressure boss, who is yet to announce whether he will continue next season Share Xhaka is the latest Arsenal star to defend Wenger (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Share     
Granit Xhaka has hit back at Arsene Wenger's forgetful and impatient critics. 
Midfielder Xhaka labelled Wenger “an outstanding coach, an outstanding guy” as he joined the list of Gunners stars leaping to the defence of the Arsenal boss. 
Long-serving Wenger is under huge pressure after another season in which the Gunners are set to come up short in the league and have crashed out of Europe early again. 
Their underwhelming campaign so far has led to supporters staging anti-Wenger protests calling for him to go after 21 years in charge. 
But Xhaka, one of four major signings last summer, said: “I only know that he is an outstanding coach, an outstanding guy, enormously open and direct. A Wenger Out banner at The Hawthorns (Photo: AFP) Arsene Wenger has decided his future at Arsenal (Photo: PA) 
“Unfortunately, it is only in the football that the current situation is considered and what happened in the past is forgotten. 
“The people demand that Arsenal win a title, especially the [Premier League] championship. 
“But they forgot that new players had to be integrated - and that no coach immediately manages to win the league with a lot of new players. 
“The expectations are high, so we know: If we do not meet them, there is criticism. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
